block.p: Because of production errors, Page 11 of the Real Estate section is omitted from some New Jersey copies today and Page 8 from some Long Island copies; each is replaced by a duplicate of another page. The missing New Jersey page carries letters and the continuation of the Your Home column; the Long Island page carries the Q&A column. The columns may be read on the Web at www.nytoday.com/realestate. Replacement pages are available from Production Quality Control, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036-3909, or (212) 556-1992. E-mail: quality@ nytimes.com. (Supply a postal address.)
